Sentencas: The V-I and polarization characteristics were measured for the solid oxide fuel cell with internal reforming of methane.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: Although the metallic surface area of Ni was low for the Ni-YSZ cermet prepared by reduction of NiO-YSZ, the activity for steam reforming reaction was high to attain equilibrium conversion at 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The high operation temperature not only reduced the polarization resistance bur also attained the high conversion of methane and selectivity to CO.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: The changes in selectivities to CO and CO2 and formation rate of H-2 were qualitatively explained by the equilibrium of steam reforming and the shift reaction.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming of methane

Sentencas: Significant contribution of concentration overvoltage was suggested for the high methane content, whereas a limiting current was observed for the dilute methane condition at high current densities.
Titulo: Power generation characteristics of solid oxide fuel cell with internal steam reforming of methane
